column1: Smoque BBQ////This is excellent BBQ! I have had the pulled pork sandwich (my favorite)
column2: have tried the brisket (if you get it as a sandwich sliced is juicier and chopped dryer but leaner FYI)
column3: and I've enjoyed the sides of cornbread
column5: like homemade mac and Â cheese
column6: and the fries!! All excellent. Every time I bring someone here
column7: they are hooked!! Just yummy! You'll thank me later!
